settings.text: You bring unrelenting energy to our community each and every day and we couldn’t be more excited to have you on our team. As our way of saying thank you, it’s time for you to unlock exclusive perks, discounts, and rewards with PERFORMIX UNLOCKED.

settings.title: What is Performix Unlocked?
settings.text: Performix Unlocked is the Performix loyalty program. For every dollar that you spend you earn points towards exclusive offers, surprise experiences and you can redeem points for products.

settings.title: How Do I Earn Points?
settings.text: Every customer that creates a Performix Driven account is eligible for Performix Unlocked. After you create your account, with each purchase you earn points towards the Performix Unlocked Program. It’s as simple as purchasing your favorite Performix products to start earning points.

settings.title: How Do I Redeem Points?
settings.text: You can redeem points during checkout when signed in to your account.

settings.title: Do Points Expire?
settings.text: Points are earned on a rolling 12-month calendar. Points will expire after 12 months from your last purchase.

settings.title: How Do I Check My Performix Unlocked Balance?
settings.text: You can check your balance by logging into your Performix account or by logging in at any time.

settings.title: What Happens If You Return Items?
settings.text: If you return products we will remove the balance from your points within 30 days.

settings.title: Are There Any Exclusions When I Redeem Points?
settings.text: Yes, for each coupon you receive there will be a minimum cart balance: $10 coupon - $50 total cart $15 coupon - $75 total cart and $20 coupon - $100 total cart.

settings.title: Do Coupons Expire?
settings.text: Yes, after 30 days your loyalty coupon code will expire

settings.title: How Does The Referral Program Work
settings.text: Each time you refer another high performer they will receive an email notification with a code to receive 15% off when they spend $75. After they check out you will receive 200 loyalty points which you can use to redeem for a $20 coupon. The $20 coupon will be applied when you spend $100.
